clearcontrol.core.variable.events

Class EventPropagator

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.variable.events.EventPropagator

  • public class EventPropagator
extends java.lang.Object
    Event propagator. This is used for example to prevent variable updates to pass twice through the same variable -- and thus to go on forever -- which is not good.
    Author:
    royer
